sentences.en: The company cannot accept liability for any damage caused by natural disasters.
sentences.cn: 该公司对自然灾害造成的任何损失概不承担责任。

sentences.en: He was ordered to pay the company $500,000 on account pending a final assessment of his liability.
sentences.cn: 在对他的债务做最后的评估期间，他被命令先付这家公司50万美元。

sentences.en: I would use credit cards over debit cards because of liability issues.
sentences.cn: 因为债务问题，我会使用信用卡而不是借记卡。
